title: Perm banned for my first offense
body: So my account has never been banned or been in any sort of trouble, and im in my lobby for champ select and it tell me i have been perma banned? isnt that crazy? has anyone been perm banned the first time?? like..... this must be some sort of mistake

replies.body: Probably just Rito doing wut ur name asked

> So my account has never been banned or been in any sort of trouble

This is actually your 3rd penalty. So, you were warned twice before this perma-ban. Your last penalty was less than a month ago too, so not so long ago.

If you disagree with the penalty, please post the chat logs and we can discuss them.
this game has gone downhill ever since they sold out to china anyway.

Tencent has been a one-sided investor in Riot for years.
Probably since before you or I joined League.
they are not just an investor, RIot games is owned in its entirety by Tencent

No, they're a "hands off investor; wanting return on their investment which if managed by them may not be successful"  There are many articles on the web about this hot topic.

Regardless, I'm not seeing this "downhill."
Your jab just seems to be a response to your perma in scorning Riot since you can't play.

Consider sending in a ticket about your ban as _The Djinn_ suggested.
Mind your manners if you get a response you don't like.
Flaming people doesn't make them want to help you out.

*Looks at summoner name*

Congratulations?

it is possible to get perma ban for first offense in cases of extreme toxicity (death threats, racism, etc) or for using scripts (if you have any add ons like lolwiz or something this can sometimes be the case) 
check your mail, if this is the case there should be a message explaining ban

> [{quoted}](name=Candoodle,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cMQA0isJ,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-03-22T14:48:20.075+0000)
>
> *Looks at summoner name*
> 

I am curious to why out of all summoner names you could've chosen, you decided on one that essentially asks to be banned because of toxicity?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

^This
It could also be a chargeback issue or a case of suspected account compromise.
it says i was banned for being toxic, but dont they usually chat restrict you first?? this is why im confused

> [{quoted}](name=ImToxicBanMePls,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cMQA0isJ,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-03-22T14:56:36.035+0000)
>
> it says i was banned for being toxic, but dont they usually chat restrict you first?? this is why im confused

That's the normal progression, but it's not a *promised* progression. Certain kinds of toxicity can cause you to skip levels, including all the way to the perma ban. Do you have the chat logs that were sent to you? Without them we can only guess, and with them we may be able to help you identify the cause.

**Edit:** Saw the logs. DEFINITELY punishment worthy (and ultimately ban worthy), although given some of the stuff I've seen I'm a little puzzled about the immediate escalation to a permanent ban -- I'd have assumed this would get you a chat restriction or 14 day ban first. Have you ever been punished in the past?
as you can see in my original post ive never been punished before....

> [{quoted}](name=ImToxicBanMePls,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cMQA0isJ,comment-id=000700010000,timestamp=2017-03-22T15:10:40.301+0000)
>
> as you can see in my original post ive never been punished before....

Hm. Interesting. I'd consider putting a ticket in to Support to see if you can find out more details. You're unlikely to be able to contest the ban (given that chat history is DEFINITELY toxic), but you might be able to find out why you were escalated immediately to a permanent ban.

A tip if you do that though -- if you want ANY chance of getting somewhere, try to be as polite and friendly as possible. Remember that the guy on the other end isn't the one who banned you, and most Rioters (all, in my personal experience) DO actually want to help the playerbase when possible. If you're polite and understanding you're more likely to get someone willing to do a big of digging and see what's up with this case.
ya right those chinese money hungry fucks dont give a damn about the average player. the only response im gonna get from riot is the same bullshit they tell everyone.

> [{quoted}](name=ImToxicBanMePls,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cMQA0isJ,comment-id=00070001000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-22T15:26:14.556+0000)
>
> ya right those chinese money hungry fucks dont give a damn about the average player. the only response im gonna get from riot is the same bullshit they tell everyone.

Having talked to many Riot employees personally for a variety of reasons? This is pretty flatly incorrect. Basically every employee there is actually SUPER devoted to trying to make the best player experience possible. The canned responses that the boards sometimes see are because there are some situations that are common enough that they NEED them due to the sheer volume of traffic Riot gets. But if you don't think it's worth trying by all means don't feel obligated to.

Perhaps they were on a second account?

IIRC, Riot can detect alternate accounts and may have decided to escalate the punishment if they were previously perma-banned on another account.
i wasnt racist or death threats or anything, just a typical silver trash player flaming his team
If there was a chat log attached, adding it to your post would help for context.

O.O  and you don't see anything offensive in this log?
You do realize there are people on the receiving end of your constant harassment right?

side note:
unless there's something missing here (like previous punishments you forgot about) 
I wouldn't have expected this to trigger a perma either; maybe a 14-day but yeah, even then.

I'm not saying I'm disappointed though, I legitimately would never want to meet someone like that in my games.
Not sure what you report rate is, maybe they figured you had no chance of changing?

Did the snowflakes get their precious feelings hurt? O you gonna  go cry now? I would hate to meet you at work, you would be the  person that runs to HR and then gets fired due to being terrible at the actual job people told you to do correctly. But you were too triggered to notice.

Please spare us I have seen worse and if they didn't like it then they could mute him. If you flame you are an ahole, if you listen to an ahole you are an idiot or are mentally unstable also. 

Grow a thicker skin and stop complaining about people being toxic no one cares. Mute them like a sane person and move on. I think banning someone for words is the stupidest thing I have ever heard. Also they have multiple accounts usually(like me) and can switch to another.

 How about you stop trying to police what other people say? Don't like it don't listen? I would rather hear that he is displeased that for everyone to be dead silent in games which I noticed at plat and above is the case since at that point they have a good amount of time in the game.


You have never played ranked but when going up or down is being cosidered I would rather have a toxic to the extreme person that clearly cares than someone that could seem to give less than a rat' sass about actively trying to win and just caring what one person says and that it somehow hurt your feelings. But then again I only play about 20 games then I move back to Dota 2 after getting plat 1 every season.

While I appreciate your passion for the subject, the majority of the community (upon which the reporting system is based) disagrees with your statement:

>I think banning someone for words is the stupidest thing I have ever heard.

The OP got perma'd immediately (which I thought was harsh for a first offense) but sugar-coating it will not help.  OP needed to be made aware that the behaviour would lead to an _eventual_ permaban regardless.
-------------------
On a side note:
>You have never played ranked

I have not played ranked _this season_ yet, no.  I am focusing on my studies right now.
In a month, after exams, I'll have time for ranked.  Not sure why it's relevant though.

Maybe stop banning people and grow a thicker skin? It seems like blizzard and dota 2 have better communities anyway. The people are smarter and kinder in my experience and its not dead silence at high elos. 

Perma-silences sure, account bans only line riots pockets and you and the rest of the community are too stupid to notice. The people they ban come back and can buy everything back anyway then go on flaming for another year. At least in dota 2 they say keep your stuff but you can no longer speak if you wish to use your cosmetics.  I think you are so ill informed also that you think the entire community thinks like you. 

Playing ranked is important because if you ever do actually get above gold(which i highly doubt given your arguments and skill lvl based on op.gg) you will realize that no one cares about communicating anymore since it can get them banned. Heck when I do my 20 games to plat 1 I remove the chat box in the config file and mute everyone. 

Again I restate I would rather have someone that is toxic than someone like you that thinks words mean anything within the context in this game and is banworthy. Maybe you are a liberal and a SJW like the rest which I'm assuming. 
Then I'll leave you with this bit: Trump won elections because of things like this done by liberals and SJWs. So long live Trump and I'm glad dota 2 doesn't have biggots like you there that police what people say in a videogame.

By all means, please, go play Dota 2. No one is forcing you to be here. Riot's game, riot's terms of service, riot's rules. You may not agree with them, but if you want to play League, you have to abide by them.

Whining and bitching about it here on the forums won't get you any sympathy. Maybe you're the one that needs to go to a safe space.
ive never been punished before, and you see much worse than this every game, which isnt an excuse but still.

I don't. I'm nice to people most of the time so almost all of my experiences in chat are quite pleasant. Even if I do find someone that I don't think is someone I feel like having discussions with I just mute them, and move on. My allies never screw me over out of spite, and they tend to listen to my suggestions since they have no reason not to trust me at that point. I also have more wins than losses overall, which I think that is partly responsible for. Just sayin

Ya mute and move on. I think Riot polices these kids too much. Now no one hardly uses chat at higher elo and because of no voice chat there is no way to fix it either. Honestly I think I would rather have a toxic person, I can reason with them. The special snowflake that gets triggered by criticism is what honestly ruins a game for me and they are usually the ones that feed and never try to stop thinking "I can get this next kill" after I just said no you can't back off and leave reset and help me....then they call me toxic.....no i want to win......its not about you at all, its about making smart moves that you're ignoring. Because of their pride they will call people toxic for wanting them to stop...they are some of the dumbest people I bet and once I read toxic in chat I mute them and never tell them anything else because you know they will try to report you since they lost the game based on their stupid mistakes you tried to stop. But now I just mute everyone I don't know and use discord. No more chat restricts and now I could careless about anything a teammate says, their loss not mine. If Riot didn't police I might actually communicate with my team but now I just hit the mute button and think f'em, they usually don't call flashes/sums anyway.

Never got another chat restrict after muting everyone and my account isn't at risk. Screw someone saying what I can't and can criticize. That is why in dictatorships and facist states there is always dead silence in the streets. Everyone is too afraid of saying the wrong thing so they watch-out for themselves and say nothing like me.

I agree. If you can't handle a few "harsh" words then you don't need to be on the internet. I mean, that's the honest truth. Not saying that it's ok for people to be assholes like that, but people have always been assholes like that. This whole "my feelings got hurt, i need protected and avenged" thing though, that's pretty new. Take note that humanity has existed for hundreds of thousands of years, if not millions, and yet within the last century both our species and the world is going to shit at an exponential rate. I place most (not all as everyone plays a part in this bullshit) of the blame on those people who can't handle the fact that the world isn't always nice to them so they play on humanity as a mass in order to be protected from the "mean" things. (gangs do that btw, just sayin). Here's a thought, a cruel, truthful, honest thought, those people who get offended and cry about it and throw temper tantrums and shit like that when they don't get their way or when people are "mean" to them. Those are the people that natural selection was going to take. Since we as a species have found a way to deny natural selection those individuals have survived along with the rest of us. If we didn't prevent natural selection from taking those that are naturally weaker mentally and physically (thanks to technology and industry the physically weak don't negatively impact our species near as much so they're not so bad) then we'd probably be a lot better off. Might be cruel of me to say those things but...........

{{champion:74}} SCIENCE BITCH!!!

I don't see worse than this every game though :/
Maybe 1 in 20 games, even then.  People just remember the negative games more than the positive ones so the "rate" seems to go up.

What I'm surprised at is that you got an immediate perma, not that you got a perma.
The above chat would work its way up to a perma regardless.
It's just _normally_ people get perma'd for chats like the one you pasted _after_ escalation to 25 game chat restrict or 14-day ban first.<---then it doesn't have to be perm-worth to get a perm.

there was no extreme toxicity, there were no death threats, there was no racism, but im still perm banned... they cant ban me just for my summoner name, its not offensive, it must be some kind of mistake.

This is positive behavior

ImToxicBanMePls: u suck
ImToxicBanMePls: u suck  

Yep this is a mistake, there is nothing but supportive, positive chat. /s

i never said anything of the sort, maybe you should trying reading a little bit before you start running your mouth, im sure this chat is punishable, im not in any way justifying my actions, but a perm ban on the FIRST offense is a little extreme dont you think?
"i never said anything of this sort" he literally just copied the lines out of your chatlogs.
what im referring to is that i never said that my chat logs werent punishable, or that i thought i did nothing wrong, god i wish you people could read before responding.
all im saying is i dont think these chat logs are perm ban worthy, like ive said multiple times and you would know if you actually read anything in this post.

You never said your chat logs weren't punishable? What about this:
>there was no extreme toxicity, there were no death threats, there was no racism, ...its not offensive, it must be some kind of mistake.  

You literally think constantly spamming "u suck", threatening to afk and berating your team couldn't be construed as offensive.

did they say what year you were banned till?

That's a ban code and tells us what you were banned for.
Hmm, you need to submit a support ticket. If your account got comprised, they will ban it until they can get it back safely to the owner.

Name checks out, lol.

No but seriously, I want to talk about a similar incident that occurred to me but I have promised to stop bringing it up now that Riot Tantram has given me some pertinent information. In any case, it CAN happen that you get hit with a zero-to-permaban punishment if the Rioter in question that pulled the trigger decides he wants to permaban you.

Let me show you what got ME a zero-to-permaban punishment, contrast with yours;

6:42] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Come on ziggs...
[6:52] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): you were WAAAAY overextended
[10:55] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Far tankier than I expected.
[12:11] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Wukong, you have ZERO damage.
[12:21] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Just going to farm, bot has no damage, top has no damage, mid is basically afk.
[12:44] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): counter ignoring janna
[13:27] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): I did 65% HP of Galio's max HP
[13:28] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): you did noithing
[13:50] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): you have no damage
[21:16] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Yes. You are reacting much more slowly.
[21:21] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Your earlier assessment was correct.
[21:43] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): You should have been talking to yourself.
[21:47] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): That was a 37 second chase and you did not react.
[22:02] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): You were not dead, you were not oom.
[23:37] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): They'r eHEAVILY stacking MR
[25:25] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): dont engage
[29:51] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): We have zero perssure.
[29:57] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): They always have absolutely everything up.
[31:50] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): so who keeps troll voting no
[32:12] [All] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): I don't mind losing. However, it really irks me to be stuck with 4 feeders that troll vote no... sigh
[32:40] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): "clean up" says the feeder.
[32:51] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): Just putting you on ignore, until you stop feeding you deserve no attention
[33:48] [All] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): gg



Game 2:
[12:44] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): ashe heal flash down 12:38

[16:29] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): bot and mid failed so hard, it was never winnable
[16:58] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): "tilt" is just a word feeders use to make themselves feel better
[17:28] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): you hard-fed
[18:32] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): It's been over for awhile. Bot and mid hard-fed
[23:07] [All] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): gg



Game 3:
[4:31] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): xerath flash 4:19

[7:34] Dominick Destine (Evelynn): DAIRUS?!??!

Now I know you are lying.

Too obvious, 1/10.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

> [{quoted}](name=Supz,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cMQA0isJ,comment-id=000e000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-30T16:02:02.411+0000)
>
> What a surprise replying with no link 

Why would I link anything to you? I already said I wouldn't and I am a man of my word. You are also blatantly lying or straight up trolling. 

I have no reason to justify any of my statements. If you are interested, it is not difficult to find my many, MANY threads about it or posts where I linked those threads. 

>You are same as OP

Actually no. 

OP was lying. I never lied. I was hit with a zero-to-permaban punishment which was later rescinded after a secondary review. Riot Tantram says I was never permabanned except I have a ton of evidence that indicates that to have been the case, once again if you are interested the threads are extremely easy to find but I doubt you are anything other than a troll.
